text: Yosyp (Osyp) Ivanovych Bezpalko (born 1881, Czernowitz (today Chernivtsi), d. 1950 in Kazakh SSR) was a Ukrainian politician and writer from Northern Bukovina. ==References== ==External links== *Yosyp Bezpalko at Encyclopedia of Ukraine *Yosyp Bezpalko at Encyclopedia of History of Ukraine Category:Members of the Executive of the Labour and Socialist International Category:1881 births Category:1950 deaths Category:People from Chernivtsi Category:People from the Duchy of Bukovina Category:Ukrainian Austro-Hungarians Category:Ukrainian Social Democratic Labour Party politicians Category:Ukrainian Social Democratic Party (1899) politicians Category:Labor ministers of Ukraine Category:Ukrainian educational theorists Category:People who died in the Gulag
title: Yosyp Bezpalko
